column2: We may disclose personal information to conform with the law,
We may disclose personal information to conform with the law,

We may disclose personal information if we believe that an emergency involving danger of death or serious injury to any person requires disclosure of communications or justifies immediate disclosure of records.

As the owner of this information, we may disclose or sell such information as an asset of the company in conjunction with the sale of the company or a substantial portion of our assets to a third party.
We may collect, compile, store, publish, promote, report, sell, or otherwise disclose or use any and all aggregate Information, provided that, such information does not personally identify you.
